metadata.name: CLOUDMACHINE x On-Chain Records  #1/100
metadata.description:
This is the companion NFT to the official CLOUDMACHINE NFT collection (https://opensea.io/collection/cloudmachine-nft). CLOUDMACHINE partnered with On-Chain Records to produce exclusive digi-physical picture disc vinyl. Limited to 100 copies, each it’s own 1/1. 

This vinyl release is securely linked to the Ethereum blockchain via a Kong NFC chip. Embedding a Kong chip into a physical record transforms it into a crypto asset that can be verified on the blockchain by scanning the record with a smartphone. 

On-Chain Records pride themselves in the immense care given to every single record. Each record is individually crafted on antique lathe cutting equipment from the 1940s - providing a unique, vintage sound. With the incorporation of blockchain technology, each record is a true collector’s item and time capsule of human creativity that spans generations.

For more information, visit:  
CLOUDMACHINE: https://twitter.com/CloudmachineNFT  
On-Chain Records: https://twitter.com/onchainrecords
